title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Luggage Room
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A perfectionist traveler, locked in the overcrowded luggage storage room during a busy check-in rush, slowly suffocates as suitcases shift and compress the diminishing air space.

death_teaser: She had it all packed. Except an exit strategy.
